snippet.title: Severed Lands | Introduction
snippet.description:
Severed Lands is a community-driven Open-World Sandbox MMORPG featuring in-depth crafting, base building, a player-driven economy, full-loot, and sieges. It is set in a world divided by two societies with their own sets of ideals, views, and ways of life. One is governed by rules and regulations with measures implemented to enforce them; the other, its polar opposite is a society that not only lacks laws and regulations but also encourages wars and chaos. To merely survive, players must utilize the raw materials that can be found in the world to gain knowledge, increase their strength and build protection to fend off wild animals and unfriendly neighbors, however, to prosper, players must set themselves apart from the others in their area of expertise, whether they are a crafter, builder, farmer, gatherer, merchant, mercenary, or any other skilled professional. In Severed Lands, you decide your goals and the best path to achieve them.
Discord: https://discord.gg/Ap5R389xET
Music: [Haven] by Alexander Nakarada (www.serpentsoundstudios.com)
